name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: With responsive keys and uses blue switches. Ideal for typing and gaming enthusiasts due to its tactile feedback and audible click sound.

name: Wireless Mouse
description: The ergonomic design prevents hand fatigue, ensuring comfort for extended usage. Features wireless connectivity for hassle-free use.

name: Gaming Headset
description: Equipped with immersive surround sound and soft ear cushions for long-lasting comfort. Perfect for gaming sessions with clear audio quality.

name: Monitor
description: This monitor features high resolution and eye-care features to reduce strain. Ideal for both work and entertainment with sharp, vivid visuals.

name: Laptop
description: Designed for productivity with a fast processor, offering efficient performance for work, gaming, and multimedia consumption.

name: Wired Mouse
description: Flexible cable provides a direct connection with no interruptions, perfect for working or gaming. Reliable and responsive with no input lag.

name: Earphone
description: Balanced sound with solid bass. Compact and lightweight design, making them ideal for on-the-go listening and hands-free calls.

name: Magic Keyboard
description: Provides a more comfortable and responsive typing experience. Features a sleek design with low-profile keys for smooth typing.

name: Usb Cable
description: Offers fast and stable connectivity between your devices. Built to last with durable materials, ensuring long-term performance.

name: Speaker
description: Designed to provide clear sound and deep bass, this speaker offers optimal sound quality for music, movies, and gaming. Its portable and compact design allows for easy transport, making it perfect for both indoor and outdoor use.

name: Wireless Keyboard
description: Wireless Bluetooth technology provides typing comfort without cables. Slim and elegant design with a long battery life for uninterrupted work.

name: Gaming Mouse
description: This gaming mouse is specially designed for gamers who prioritize speed and precision, with an advanced sensor and adjustable DPI. Durable and responsive.

name: TWS Earphone
description: Offers high-quality sound with a compact and comfortable design. Equipped with Bluetooth wireless technology and deep bass for immersive music experiences.

name: HDMI Cable
description: Provides high-quality video and audio connections between devices like TVs, monitors, laptops, or gaming consoles. With high data transfer speed for clear visuals.

name: Power Adapter Cable
description: Made from high-quality materials, this cable ensures stable and fast power delivery, keeping your devices ready for use and extending battery life.

name: USB Drive
description: Offers portable storage with a large capacity in a compact size. Easy to use, just plug it into a USB port to transfer files at high speeds for convenience.

name: HDD
description: Provides large data storage with high reliability. This HDD offers a large capacity of up to 1TB With fast read/write speeds and robust design, it ensures your data is safe while being easily accessible.

name: SSD
description: This SSD delivers exceptional read and write speeds, making your system run faster and more responsive. With 512GB capacity, it shortens boot-up time for a smooth experience.

name: Cooling Pad
description: Equipped with two fans working efficiently to keep your deviceâ€™s temperature stable, preventing overheating and ensuring smooth performance during intensive tasks.

name: Fan Cooler
description: Specially designed to cool your phone, keeping the temperature stable while gaming or using heavy apps. This fan cooler is easy to install and use, perfect for mobile gamers.
